Sandusky City Schools will be closed the remainder of the school year in accordance with Governor DeWine's orders.

span.span: The "bird's-eye view" 2020 - 2021 School Calendar is now available.

div.span: The Sandusky City Schools Board of Education unanimously approved the hiring of Mr. Jeff
Hall to serve as the district’s next CFO and Treasurer at its regular Board meeting on Monday, April
20th. Board President, Mrs. Brigitte Green-Churchwell acknowledged that Mr. Hall brings a wealth

br.span: of knowledge and executive experience with him. As a former school Treasurer and private financial
management consultant, Mr. Hall is highly skilled in financial services. His leadership has been demonstrated
in serving as the chair of the Finance Committee for a successful Bond Levy in his previous district as well as
leading his fiscal team in receiving the annual Auditor of State awards.

a.span: Click here to read the Press Release

td.span: Students Interested in Applying for the GLVPAA Next Year

span.span: If you are interested in applying for the #GLVPAA next year, please visit the site below. On the site you can view specific admissions information for your arts program and find our application. The deadline to apply is May 1, 2020. Please contact Mrs. Shepherd at

a.span: Click here to visit the site.

span.div: The Sandusky Digital Academy is expecting students to log-on and complete lessons. Please like the SDA Facebook page to access important information. The students will be hearing from their teachers this week.
Please direct any questions to your teachers via the online platform or call Sherry Smith at 419-984-1060.

td.span: Sign up for Free Books in Ohio with the Imagination Library!

span.span: The Ohio Governor’s Imagination Library is working to put more books in the hands of Ohio’s children and ensure that every student enters kindergarten ready to succeed. Imagination Library was started by country singer Dolly Parton and offers age-appropriate books to children from birth to age 5, regardless of parent income.

br.span: The Ohio Department of Education Office for Early Learning and School Readiness is encouraging all preschools, Head Start/Early Head Start programs, and childcare settings to share information about the Ohio Governor’s Imagination Library and encourage families to enroll into the

span.strong: How can students go about obtaining a work permit under Ohio’s Minor Labor Laws if schools are closed?

br.br:
According to the Ohio Department of Commerce, if a minor has all necessary paperwork completed and is unable to get the permit processed due to school closure, the completed paperwork may itself stand in the place of the physically printed permit. Employers should keep the paperwork on file, just like they would the permit. The formal permit should be processed as soon as the school is reopened.
As a reminder, hour restrictions outlined in Ohio Revised Code Section 4109 are still in place for any week that was not a pre-planned school holiday (i.e., spring break) and the prohibited/hazardous occupation restrictions are still active.

td.span: Families Needing Paper Packets for Students

span.strong: Attention Families needing Paper Packets for students:

br.span: If you are in need of a paper packet for your student, please leave an email at
that includes your students' name, grade level, and address. We will then get those mailed out to you.

div.span: As we move through the week, we just want to take a moment to remind everyone a few important notes:

li.span: Enrichment packets information can be found on the right side of this page.
As a reminder, we will be serving free lunch with next day breakfast at 11 locations across the city from 12pm-1pm Monday through Friday. More information can be found at the bottom of this page.
Remember, if you have any questions, you can call and leave a message at 419-626-6940, check our website for updates, or email Dr. Sanders directly at
. We will respond to your email in 24 hours.
We are going to move to a once a week update. If any new information arrises, we will update you as soon as we receive it.
